name: Lawn Care
description: Professional lawn mowing, edging, and trimming tailored to your property's needs. We maintain your lawn at the optimal height for healthy growth while ensuring crisp edges and a pristine appearance every visit.

name: Spring Cleanup
description: Comprehensive spring preparation to kickstart your lawn's growing season. We remove winter debris, rake thatch, edge flower beds, and provide an initial mow to set the foundation for a beautiful yard all season long.

name: Fall Cleanup
description: Complete fall cleanup to prepare your property for winter. Our service includes leaf removal, final mowing, bed preparation, and debris clearing to protect your lawn and keep your property looking its best through the cold months.

name: Storm Tree Cleanup
description: Fast, reliable cleanup after storm damage. We remove fallen branches, debris, and damaged vegetation to restore safety and curb appeal to your property quickly and efficiently.

name: Mulch & Flowerbeds
description: Professional mulch installation and flowerbed maintenance to enhance your landscape's beauty and health. We refresh existing beds, apply quality mulch, and edge for a clean, polished look that protects your plants.

name: Leaf Cleanup
description: Thorough leaf removal to keep your lawn healthy and your property pristine. Using professional-grade equipment, we clear leaves from lawns, beds, and hardscapes to prevent turf damage and maintain a beautiful yard.

name: Power Washing
description: High-pressure cleaning for driveways, sidewalks, decks, patios, and siding. We remove dirt, grime, mold, and stains to restore your home's exterior surfaces to like-new condition and boost curb appeal.

name: Gutter Cleaning
description: Professional gutter cleaning to protect your home from water damage. We remove leaves, debris, and buildup from your gutters and downspouts, ensuring proper drainage and preventing costly repairs.
